subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Leaders of the United States’ Olympic sports federations have asked the chairman of the United States Olympic Committee to explain the unexpected ouster of the chief executive Jim Scherr. They originally drafted a letter to the committee expressing their disappointment in the move, but decided to ask Larry Probst, the committee chairman, to join them on a conference call Monday. usoc.
